adventure_overview: Lions and adult partners will have a great time fishing together. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

content.value: With your Lion adult partner, learn the rules of fishing safely.

requirements.text: With your Lion adult partner, learn the rules of fishing safely.

activities.name: Lions Fish Safely
activities.description: Learn the rules to fishing safely.

activities.name: Safe or Not Safe Fishing Rules
activities.description: After reviewing the safety rules, use a quiz to see what Cub Scouts have learned.

content.value: Draw a picture of the type of fish you think lives in the water where you are going fishing.

requirements.text: Draw a picture of the type of fish you think lives in the water where you are going fishing.

activities.name: Drawing Fish With A Grid
activities.description: Learn to draw a fish by using the grid method.

content.value: Go fishing with your Lion adult partner.

activities.name: Lion Go Fishing
